comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8073?focusedCommentId=17057865) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
`[~mrkn]` this is class is used internally in `arrow::dataset::`, I'm curious what you need it for in GLib. We have no intention of creating APIs which require usage of this class, so you won't need it for interacting with datasets

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8073?focusedCommentId=17065391) by Kenta Murata (mrkn):*
We decided that we don't use PathForest in GLib binding.
